q1: Leonel Messi plays for Argentina. Is he planning on retiring any time soon?
a1: He will play the next WC at most or retire before
q2: I think Messi will play in at least one more World Cup.
a2: I would hope so; he is still a very serviceable player.
q3: He also would like to win a world cup before he retires
a3: When is the next World Cup?
q4: The world cup is June 14- July 15
a4: Should Argentina have done better in the World Cup
q5: Messi was very disappointed in how he played for Argentina.
a5: Messi is the best player in the history of football
